name: victory-star

effect.sword_shield: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.

effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.
effect.legends_arceus: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.

short_effect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
